summary:
French is a Romance language that originated from Latin, spoken in the Roman Empire. It evolved from Gallo-Romance, mainly in northern France. French is spoken in many countries, including France, Canada, Belgium, and parts of Africa. There are around 310 million French speakers worldwide, with about 80 million native speakers. 

French is an official language in 27 countries and is used in international organizations like the United Nations and the European Union. It's also one of the most studied languages globally.
title: French language
